docs.lead_paragraph: ''How to Make Your Man Look Good (Without Making Him Feel Bad),'' by Nancy Butcher. Perigee/Berkley Publishing Group, $13.95. This book is for women who have husbands or boyfriends who are totally uninformed about looking and feeling their best and rely on the women in their lives to come to the rescue.
docs.abstract: Book How to Make Your Man Look Good (Without Making Him Feel Bad) by Nancy Butcher furnishes advice to women who are involved with men in need of physical and social makeovers; seeks to show women ways to improve men's health as well as style in lighthearted, nurturing ways; photo (S)

keywords.value: HOW TO MAKE YOUR MAN LOOK GOOD (BOOK)

docs.lead_paragraph: A new process involving ultrasound may soon add an important nonsurgical option to a list of less-than-perfect treatments for uterine fibroids, the noncancerous tumors that lodge in the muscle of the uterus. The technique uses focused ultrasound waves to destroy the tumors through the skin and, unlike hysterectomy, the most common treatment for fibroids, does not require hospitalization.

headline.main: Ultrasound Found Safe for Uterine Fibroid Tumors

docs.abstract: Dr Elizabeth A Stewart, Boston's Brigham and Women's Hospital Center for Uterine Fibroids clinical director, publishes study in American Journal of Obstetrics and Gynecology that confirms safety of high intensity focused ultrasound in treating noncancerous fibroid tumors; effectiveness of procedure, known as HIFU, requires more research according to study; current treatments for fibroids are discussed and evaluated; HIFU results in Israel and Europe show promise, with Chaim Sheba Medical Center in Tel Aviv reporting that 75% of center's patients studied experienced reduction in symptoms (S)
